articles.author: Samantha Dick
articles.title: Northern Territory records one new local COVID-19 case linked to Katherine outbreak - ABC News
articles.description: On what authorities say is "clearly a positive day", with only one new case recorded and some residents leaving hard lockdown, Chief Minister Michael Gunner has taken aim at conspiracy theorists "mostly [in] America, Canada and the UK".
articles.content:
The Northern Territory has recorded one new local case of COVID-19 overnight, Chief Minister Michael Gunner says.
The Territory's cluster now stands at 52 cases.
The new case is a teenager from Bin… [+5711 chars]

articles.title: Ahmaud Arbery trial in US: All three men found guilty of murdering Black man as he jogged - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: The trio of white American men grabbed guns and jumped in a pickup truck to pursue Ahmaud Arbery after seeing him jogging through their neighbourhood.
articles.content:
All three white men charged in the death of Ahmaud Arbery were convicted of murder in the fatal shooting that became part of a larger national reckoning on racial injustice in the US.
 The convictio… [+3735 chars]
